item.description:
Shakshuka ðŸ…ðŸ³ One of my all time favorites Ingredients -Red bell pepper -Onion -Tomatoes (I used a mix of fresh and fire roasted canned tomatoes) -Garlic -Paprika -Coriander -Cumin seeds / ground cumin -Chili powder -Oregano -Salt -Eggs Toppings -Parsley -Mint -Yogurt Serve with some crusty bread or pita!

item.description:
STEAK AU POIVRE SANDWICH ðŸ¥© INGREDIENTS For the steak: -Ribeye or NY Strip -Salt -Black peppercorns -Garlic -Rosemary -Butter (to baste) -Beef tallow or avocado oil (to sear) For the sauce: -Shallot -Cognac -Butter -Green peppercorns in brine -Beef stock -Heavy cream -Dijon mustard For the fries -Russet potatoes -Salt -High-temp frying oil For the onions -Yellow onions -Extra virgin olive oil -Butter -Salt -Fresh thyme -Cognac

item.title: DETROIT STYLE PIZZA ðŸ• INGREDIENTS For the dough: -310g Bread Fl...
item.description:
DETROIT STYLE PIZZA ðŸ• INGREDIENTS For the dough: -310g Bread Flour -10g Salt -10g Fresh Yeast -220g Warm water -Olive Oil For the sauce: -1 can of San Marzano tomatoes -Tomato paste -1 garlic clove -1 Tbsp olive oil -Pinch of Salt -Dried oregano -Fresh or dry basil -Calabrian chili or red pepper flakes (optional for some heat) You can also make a raw sauce with just tomatoes, salt, black pepper, olive oil, For the toppings: -Wisconsin brick cheese and/or low-moisture mozzarella -Provolone, Fontina, or Scamorza -Spicy or mild Italian sausage -Cup and Char pepperoni -Hot Honey -Fresh Basil
#detroitpizza #cooking

item.title: CHILI CHEESE BOWL Ingredients Chili Ground beef (80 / 20) 1 ye...
item.description:
CHILI CHEESE BOWL Ingredients Chili Ground beef (80 / 20) 1 yellow onion 1 poblano pepper 1 jalapeÃ±o (seeded for mild) Garlic 3 tbsp tomato paste 3 tbsp ancho chili powder or quality chili blend (see homemade recipe below) 1 cup of amber beer or lager OR 4 tbsp dry vermouth 1 can (28 oz / 800 g) fire roasted crushed tomatoes A few chipotle peppers in adobo (adjust to preference) 2 cups beef stock 1 bay leaf 2 cans (15 oz) beans (I used a mix of pinto, red kidney, and black beans) Salt 1 tbsp fresh lime juice Optional: -1-2 tsp brown sugar -1 tsp cocao powder For assembly: Small sourdough boules Unsalted butter Garlic Parsley Shredded cheese such as sharp cheddar or Monterey/Colby Jack) Scallions For the Homemade Chili Blend Toast and grind whole cumin seeds and whole coriander seeds Add: -Mexican oregano -Paprika -Smoked Paprika -Cayenne pepperâ€¨-Black pepper -Pinch of cinnamon P.S. Feel free to omit the beef for a vegetarian option ðŸ˜Š P.P.S. You can also deglaze with just stock instead of alcohol
#chili #winter
